scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/cmaps public/standard_fonts public/wasm public/image_decoders && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs public/pdf.worker.min.mjs && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/wasm/*.wasm public/wasm/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/wasm/*.wasm public/ && cp -r node_modules/pdfjs-dist/cmaps/*.bcmap public/cmaps/ && cp -r node_modules/pdfjs-dist/standard_fonts/*.pfb public/standard_fonts/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/image_decoders/*.mjs public/image_decoders/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/image_decoders/*.mjs public/ || true
